answer_facts.UG Programs (B.Tech): Computer Science & Engineering (CSE), Electronics & Communication Engineering (ECE), Electrical & Electronics Engineering (EEE), Mechanical Engineering (ME), Civil Engineering (CE), Information Technology (IT)
answer_facts.PG Programs: M.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering, Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
answer_facts.Annual Intake: 480 for UG programs, 18 for PG program in CSE
answer_facts.Approval: Approved by AICTE and affiliated to APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University
answer_facts.Additional Info: MCA program started in 2000 with intake of 35, Civil Engineering added in 2008

answer_facts.Address: LBS College of Engineering, Muliyar, Kasaragod District, Kerala - 671542, India
answer_facts.Location: Situated in Muliyar Panchayath, 12 km from Kasaragod town
answer_facts.Office Hours: 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM (Monday to Friday), 9:00 AM to 1:00 PM (Saturday)

answer_facts.Facilities: Reading rooms, reference section, digital library, photocopying

answer_facts.Application Mode: Through KEAM (Kerala Engineering Architecture Medical) counselling
answer_facts.Eligibility: 10+2 with minimum 50% marks in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics
answer_facts.Lateral Entry: Diploma holders can apply for direct second year admission
answer_facts.Important Dates: KEAM application usually opens in January, counselling in June-July
answer_facts.Documents Required: KEAM rank card, 10th & 12th marksheets, transfer certificate, conduct certificate, passport size photos

answer_facts.Other Fees: Caution deposit (refundable): ₹5,000, Library fee: ₹1,500, Exam fee: ₹2,000 per semester
answer_facts.Payment Mode: Online payment available through college portal
answer_facts.Scholarships: Merit scholarships, SC/ST scholarships, EWS scholarships available

answer_facts.Boys Hostel: Separate hostel blocks with capacity for 300 students
answer_facts.Girls Hostel: Secure hostel with capacity for 200 students
answer_facts.Rooms: Single, double, and triple sharing rooms available
answer_facts.Facilities: Wi-Fi, reading room, TV room, indoor games, gym, laundry
answer_facts.Mess: Separate vegetarian and non-vegetarian mess with North & South Indian food
answer_facts.Medical: First aid facility, tie-up with nearby hospitals
answer_facts.Visiting Hours: Parents can visit on weekends with prior permission

answer_facts.Placement Cell: Dedicated Training & Placement Cell with full-time coordinator
answer_facts.Companies Visited: TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Tech Mahindra, Cognizant, Bosch, BYJU'S, etc.
answer_facts.Training Programs: Aptitude training, technical workshops, mock interviews, GD sessions
answer_facts.Internships: Summer internships with stipend in reputed companies
answer_facts.Higher Studies: Guidance for GATE, CAT, GRE, TOEFL exams

answer_facts.Full Name: Lal Bahadur Shastri College of Engineering, Kasaragod
answer_facts.Address: LBS College of Engineering, Muliyar, Kasaragod District, Kerala - 671542
answer_facts.Tourist Attractions Nearby: Bekal Fort, Madhur temple, Ananthapuri temple

answer_facts.Office Hours: 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM (Monday to Friday), 9:00 AM to 1:00 PM (Saturday)
answer_facts.Class Timing: 9:15 AM to 4:00 PM with lunch break from 1:00 PM to 1:45 PM
answer_facts.Library Hours: 8:30 AM to 8:00 PM (Weekdays), 8:30 AM to 5:00 PM (Saturday), 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM (Sunday)
answer_facts.Holidays: Follows Kerala Government and University holidays

answer_facts.Playground: Large playground for cricket, football, volleyball
answer_facts.Indoor Stadium: Multi-purpose indoor stadium for badminton, table tennis, chess
answer_facts.Sports Offered: Cricket, football, basketball, volleyball, badminton, table tennis, chess, carrom
answer_facts.Coaching: Professional coaching available for major sports

answer_facts.Computer Labs: 8 computer labs with 400+ systems, high-speed internet
answer_facts.Department Labs: Separate labs for each engineering department
answer_facts.Special Labs: CAD/CAM lab, DSP lab, VLSI lab, Networking lab
answer_facts.Equipment: Modern equipment as per AICTE and university norms
answer_facts.Software: Licensed software: MATLAB, AutoCAD, ANSYS, Oracle, etc.
answer_facts.Timings: 8:30 AM to 8:00 PM (All days including weekends during project work)
answer_facts.Research Centers: Mechanical Engineering and Computer Science & Engineering recognized as research centres

answer_facts.Full Name: Lal Bahadur Shastri College of Engineering, Kasaragod
answer_facts.Managed by: L B S Centre for Science and Technology, Thiruvananthapuram (Government of Kerala autonomous body)
answer_facts.Initial Programs: Started with 4 B.Tech programs (ME, EEE, CSE, ECE) with 240 seats
answer_facts.Campus Development: Current campus constructed at 52 acres of land given by Plantation Corporation Kerala at Povval
answer_facts.Growth Timeline: IT program added in 2000, Civil Engineering in 2008, PG programs added 2013-15
answer_facts.University Affiliations: Initially under Calicut University (1993-1996), then Kannur University (1996-2015), now APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University (from 2015)
answer_facts.Infrastructure Growth: Started with 20,000 sq.ft., now expanded to 2.5 lakh sq.ft. with separate department buildings
answer_facts.Vision: To become a paragon institution for pursuance of Education and Research in Engineering and Technology
answer_facts.Mission: Impart finest quality Technical Education & Training, Nurture a vision of Sustainable development, Bequeath it to the next generation of professionals

answer_facts.Technical Clubs: IEEE Student Branch, CSI, ISTE, IETE, SAE
answer_facts.Cultural Clubs: Music club, Dance club, Drama club, Fine arts club
answer_facts.Other Clubs: Entrepreneurship cell, Literary club, Photography club, Nature club
answer_facts.Membership: Open to all students, nominal membership fee

answer_facts.Bus Service: College buses from major towns in Kasaragod district
answer_facts.Private Vehicles: Parking facility available for students and staff
answer_facts.Local Transport: Auto rickshaws and taxis available near campus
answer_facts.Safety: Female attendants in girls' buses, GPS tracking

answer_facts.Research: Active in research publications and funded projects
answer_facts.Departments: Separate departments for each engineering discipline
answer_facts.Development: Regular faculty development programs and workshops

answer_facts.Auditoriums: Main auditorium with seating capacity of 1500, plus open-air auditorium
answer_facts.Hostels: Separate hostels for boys and girls on campus
answer_facts.Other Facilities: Seminar halls, staff rooms, laboratories, college main stadium, multi-sports play space

answer_facts.Research Centers: Mechanical Engineering and Computer Science & Engineering recognized as research centres
answer_facts.PhD Programs: Research programs available in all engineering departments
answer_facts.PG Programs Added: Four post graduate programmes added during 2013-15
answer_facts.Research Focus: Active research in engineering and technology fields
answer_facts.Faculty Research: Faculty involved in funded research projects and publications

answer_facts.Vision: To become a paragon institution for pursuance of Education and Research in Engineering and Technology
answer_facts.Mission 1: Impart finest quality Technical Education & Training
answer_facts.Mission 2: Nurture a vision of Sustainable development
answer_facts.Mission 3: Bequeath it to the next generation of professionals
answer_facts.Purpose: Education for Empowerment (as mentioned in existing FAQ)
answer_facts.Managed by: L B S Centre for Science and Technology, an autonomous body owned by the Government of Kerala

answer_facts.Location: Spacious canteen located near the administrative block
answer_facts.Types of Food: South Indian and North Indian dishes available (Veg & Non-Veg)
answer_facts.Timings: 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM on all working days
answer_facts.Prices: Subsidized rates for students and staff

answer_facts.Committee: Anti-Ragging Committee and Anti-Ragging Squad are active
answer_facts.Actions: Ragging is a criminal offence; perpetrators will be suspended/dismissed
answer_facts.Monitoring: CCTV surveillance and faculty squads monitor the campus
answer_facts.For Freshers: Separate induction program and orientation to ensure safety

answer_facts.Facility: LBS College Employees Co-operative Society Store
answer_facts.Items Available: Textbooks, practical records, engineering drawing instruments, stationery
answer_facts.Benefits: Items sold at discounted rates for students

answer_facts.AICTE Schemes: Pragati Scholarship for girls, Saksham for differently-abled
answer_facts.Fee Waiver: Tuition Fee Waiver (TFW) scheme for meritorious students with lower income

answer_facts.Connectivity: High-speed internet connectivity provided via NKN (National Knowledge Network)
answer_facts.Wi-Fi: Campus-wide Wi-Fi access in academic blocks and hostels
answer_facts.Access: Free access for students and staff for academic purposes
answer_facts.Computer Center: Central computing facility available for browsing and research

answer_facts.Bank: Nearby branches of nationalized banks (Canara Bank, SBI) within 2km
answer_facts.ATM: ATM facility available near the college entrance/main gate area
answer_facts.Transactions: College fee payments are fully digital/online
answer_facts.Loans: Assistance provided for educational loan documentation
